name: echoed-voice
effect: Inflicts regular damage. If any friendly Pokémon used this move earlier this turn or on the previous turn, that use’s power is added to this move’s power, to a maximum of 200.
short_effect: Power increases by 100% for each consecutive use by any friendly Pokémon, to a maximum of 200.

flavor_text.scarlet_violet: The user attacks the target with an echoing voice. If this move is used consecutively by any Pokémon, its power is boosted.
